![Black-myth-wukong-golden-carp.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/54/Black-myth-wukong-golden-carp.jpg)| Golden Carp| Epic | Moderately increases the chance of obtaining materials from defeated enemies | Found in The Webbed Hollow upon defeating Yellow Loong | Golden Carp

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*, likely a collectible or equippable artifact. Based on the surrounding text, it is part of a guide detailing rare and epic items found in "The Webbed Hollow" area. These items provide various gameplay benefits, such as increasing poison damage, material drop rates, or critical hit chances. The image showcases the item's design, emphasizing its unique and ornate appearance.
